hum.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
hum.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: He began to hum a tune.
Tony was humming to himself as he drove along.
hum.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to make a low continuous sound
hum.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Machines hummed on the factory floor.

hum.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: By nine o'clock, the restaurant was humming.
